title: Card Scramble: Viola's Diner
description: Card Scramble: Viola’s Diner is a heartfelt single-player adventure that blends card play with board game strategy. You’ll help Viola revive her family diner by preparing dishes, unlocking new designs, and customizing the space to reflect her memories. Along the way, meet colorful characters like Uncle Joey and enjoy hundreds of levels filled with warmth, challenge, and discovery.
